# ----- Earnings management factor ------------------------------
accruals = (ts_backfill(df["income_netIncome"]) - ts_backfill(df["cashflow_operatingCashFlow"]))

total_assets = ts_backfill(df["balance_totalAssets"])
accrual_ratio = accruals / total_assets

alpha = -group_neutralize(
            group_rank_normalized(accrual_ratio.abs(), subindustry),
            subindustry)

custom_feature = cs_winsor(alpha, (0.02, 0.98)).rename("custom_feature")
